actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow the tax-free rollover into an individual retirement account or annuity of the proceeds from the redemption of bonds acquired under a qualified bond purchase plan.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income proceeds from the redemption of bonds acquired under a tax-exempt bond purchase plan which are transferred to an individual retirement account within 60 days after such redemption.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow the tax-free rollover into an individual retirement account or annuity of the proceeds from the redemption of bonds acquired under a qualified bond purchase plan.
